Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Just as by watering the roots and trunk of a tree, all its leaves and branches become green.

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Just as a faithful, truthful, virtuous wife remains attentive in the service of her husband, the whole family praises her, adores her very happily.

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Just as the mouth eats sweetmeats and all the limbs of the body feels satiated and strong.
